statements.statement: select * from TM_DUOC_HOATCHAT where BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND HOATCHAT = '1'
statements.insert:
select TT_DUOC_CANHBAO_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TT_DUOC_CANHBAO ( DUOC_CANHBAO_ID ,TIEPNHAN_ID , BENHAN_ID , REF_ID , REF_TABLE , BENHNHAN_ID , BACSI_ID , LOAICANHBAO , DUOC_ID , TENDUOCDAYDU , NOIDUNG , THOIGIANCANHBAO , TRANGTHAI , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #ID# , #TIEPNHAN_ID# , #BENHAN_ID# , #REF_ID# , #REF_TABLE# , #BENHNHAN_ID# , #BACSI_ID# , #LOAICANHBAO# , #DUOC_ID# , #TENDUOCDAYDU# , #NOIDUNG# , #THOIGIANCANHBAO# , #TRANGTHAI# , #BENHVIEN_ID# )

select TT_DUOC_CANHBAO_CHITIET_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TT_DUOC_CANHBAO_CHITIET ( DUOC_CANHBAO_CHITIET_ID , DUOC_CANHBAO_ID , TUONGTAC_DUOC_ID , TUONGTAC_TENDUOCDAYDU , NOIDUNG , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #ID# , #DUOC_CANHBAO_ID# , #TUONGTAC_DUOC_ID# , #TUONGTAC_TENDUOCDAYDU# , #NOIDUNG# , #BENHVIEN_ID# )
